sections.title: 1. Welcome to the
sections.summary: This section introduces the Adobe Hackathon challenge and sets the tone for innovation and intelligent PDF experiences.

sections.title: 2. Round 1A: Understand Your Document
sections.summary: This section outlines the task of building a PDF heading extractor with precise output formatting using Docker.

sections.title: 3. Round 1B: Persona-Driven Document Intelligence
sections.summary: Describes how to extract and rank relevant sections from multiple PDFs based on user persona and job.
